name: zimax-networks-website
description: Zimax Networks Limited - Azure-Native AI Solutions for Enterprise Customers

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && cp index.html styles.css script.js favicon.svg build/
scripts.validate: npm run validate:html && npm run validate:css && npm run validate:js
scripts.validate:html: grep -q '<!DOCTYPE html>' index.html && echo '✅ HTML validation passed'
scripts.validate:css: grep -q 'body {' styles.css && echo '✅ CSS validation passed'
scripts.validate:js: grep -q 'document.addEventListener' script.js && echo '✅ JavaScript validation passed'
